name: Ecomdy Pixel
author: Ecomdy Media

sections.description:
Ecomdy Pixel is a WordPress plugin that seamlessly connects TikTok Pixel to WooCommerce. Simplify the integration of TikTok Pixel tracking codes and enhance your advertising efforts on TikTok.

Learn more about TikTok Pixel at TikTok Business.

Adding TikTok Pixel ID

Easily add your TikTok Pixel ID to the system:

  1. Navigate to the admin panel.
  2. Click the ‘Add Pixel’ button.
  3. Fill in the Pixel ID and Pixel Name information.
  4. Click ‘Create Pixel.’

Obtaining Pixel ID from Ecomdy Media’s Ecosystem

To get your TikTok Pixel ID from Ecomdy Media’s ecosystem:

  1. Navigate to the admin panel.
  2. Click the ‘Add Pixel’ button.
  3. Fill in the Pixel ID and Pixel Name information (Pixel ID is provided by Ecomdy and is 24 characters long).
  4. The system automatically checks the Pixel ID on Ecomdy’s system and returns the official Pixel ID.

Additional Notes

  • For more information about TikTok Pixel, visit TikTok Business.

Third-Party Service Disclosure

Ecomdy Pixel relies on a third-party service provided by Ecomdy Media for certain functionalities. This service is used to obtain TikTok Pixel IDs necessary for integrating TikTok Pixel with WooCommerce.

Under the following circumstances, Ecomdy Pixel interacts with the Ecomdy Media service:
– When obtaining TikTok Pixel IDs from Ecomdy Media’s ecosystem.

Ecomdy Pixel sends requests to the following domain:
– ads.ecomdymedia.com

For more information about Ecomdy Media’s service, please visit:
– Ecomdy Media

Please review Ecomdy Media’s terms of use and privacy policy to understand how your data is handled by the service.

License

Ecomdy Pixel is licensed under the GPLv2 or later:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ecomdy-pixel folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure your TikTok Pixel settings in the admin panel under ‘TikTok Pixel.’
sections.faq:
How do I check if the plugin is working properly?

Install the TikTok pixel helper from Chrome extensions.

How i get the Pixel code

The pixel code was approved by the Ecomdy platform.
You can get the Pixel code in the TikTok Ads account also.

How do I configure TikTok Pixel for my WooCommerce store?

Simply fill in the Pixel ID and Pixel Name information; the rest is automated.

How can I track events, such as ‘ViewContent,’ ‘AddToCart,’ ‘InitiateCheckout,’ and ‘Purchase’?

The plugin automatically tracks essential WooCommerce events, such as ‘ViewContent’ when a product is viewed, ‘AddToCart’ when a product is added to the cart, ‘InitiateCheckout’ when starting the checkout process, and ‘Purchase’ when completing the order. The tracking is implemented in JavaScript and seamlessly works with TikTok Pixel.
